member.name: M:PerfCopy.CopyExtensions.CopyMemory(System.Byte*,System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copy data from into .
member.remarks: If or are not originally for byte-oriented data, length will need to be adjusted accordingly, e.g. UInt3232 pointer vs. byte pointer = 4x length. Method auto-optimises for word size (32/64-bit) on the machine ISA.
member.param: Length/quantity of data to copy, in bytes.

member.name: M:PerfCopy.CopyExtensions.ThrowOnInvalidArgument``1(``0[],``0[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Used to verify arguments for a method of the form "copy items, possibly with modification, from [] to [].".
member.typeparam: Type of the source and destination arrays.
member.param: Number of items to copy from into .
